description: Application for a non-material amendment to planning permission Ref: P1585.22 dated 16/01/2024 to substitute the approved plans listed on the decision notice (Demolition of all buildings and redevelopment to provide a hotel (within Use Class C1) at ground floor and part three and part four storeys over; together with premises at ground floor for the display or retail sale of goods, other than hot food (Use Class E(a)); and/or for the sale of food and drink for consumption (mostly) on the premises (Use Class E(b)), and/or for the provision of financial services, professional services or other appropriate services in a commercial, business or service locality (Use Class E(c)).)
decision_conditions: The amendments to the approved application listed below are considered to be of a minor nature and acceptable in their own right and will not require resubmission of a fresh planning application.
The following amendments are deemed to be accepted:
1.	Substation and switch room incorporated (to rear of building, adjacent to Wilson Close);
2.	Staircase layout amended (adjacent to Wilson Close) to accommodate substation and switch room;
3.	Commercial unit 3 refuse storage re-located from rear of building to commercial yard;
4.	Secondary entrance to hotel re-arranged, external ramps adjusted, cycle store, refuse and plant spaces re-organised. Door opening locations adjusted accordingly;
5.	Window omitted to south elevation to accommodate relocated refuse storage.
The permission hereby granted does not supercede the previously imposed conditions or the terms of legal agreement.
